InstructionData.Title: Air Conditioner
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: # Air Conditioner 1.0 https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library​ # Controls up to 5 wall coolers​ alias GasSensor d0​ alias Cooler1 d1​ alias Cooler2 d2​ alias Cooler3 d3​ alias Cooler4 d4​ alias Cooler5 d5​ ​ alias setpoint r0​ alias current r1​ alias error r2​ alias bias r3​ alias kp r4​ alias pidout r5​ ​ move setpoint 294.15 # setpoint temperature in Kelvin​ move kp 5​ move bias 0.0​ ​ start:​ yield​ l current GasSensor Temperature​ sub error setpoint current​ add error error bias​ mul pidout kp error # kp​ mul pidout pidout -1 # invert​ s db Setting pidout​ ​ slt r9 4 pidout​ s Cooler5 On r9​ slt r9 3 pidout​ s Cooler4 On r9​ slt r9 2 pidout​ s Cooler3 On r9​ slt r9 1 pidout​ s Cooler2 On r9​ slt r9 0 pidout​ s Cooler1 On r9​ j start
